transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam bolo.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning. Good morning sir kaise hain?
Customer: Good morning. Abhi tak toh sahi hai.
Executive: Accha sir maine na abhi aapko kuch leads bheji hui hai aur woh saari Rajasthan wali bheji maine. Thik hai? Toh usko ek bari dekh lijiye ki aapke usme aa rahi hai ki nahi aa rahi hai. Kyunki ek lead hai apne paas mein sofa chair ki woh wali bheji maine aur ek baki ki jo hai woh dining table set ki hai.
Customer: Hai na? Kaunsi deal bheji woh sofa kursi kursi ki ek ek wala kya bhejenge?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Koi quantity wali deal bheji?
Executive: Quantity wali hai. Ek apne paas mein jo hai woh 55 se 60,000 ke beech ki hai. Ek apne paas mein 25-30 ki hai. Rajasthan hai toh aap easy deal kar sakte ho. Aapne bola hi tha ki sir ko offer chahiye.
Customer: Main toh kahin bhi kar lunga. Hum apna idhar se thodi dikkat hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap Rajasthan Customer bolte hain door matlab zyada door customer bol rahe hain hum ek cheez aap se kyun le?
Executive: Agar main Maharashtra agar main Maharashtra aur other cities ki bhejti hoon toh phir aapko bulk ki bhejungi. Lekin agar apne paas mein Rajasthan ki acchi quantity mein matlab quantity kya acchi usme available hai toh phir hum waha toh deal kar hi sakte hain na. Phir waha quantity ka issue nahi aayega kyunki local hai. Hai na? Aur dusra jo ek aur hai na Bikaner Rajasthan ki hai woh wali bulk bhi lead hai more than 1 crore ki lead hai aur woh 20,000 pieces ki requirement hai. Toh yeh wali ek bari dekh lijiyega iske agar dekhna hai toh.
Customer: Main ghante bhar mein karunga. Ghante bhar mein karunga main abhi toh dusri nayi lead bhejna tab tak toh yeh log kar lenge.
Executive: Haan haan koi issue nahi hai. Koi issue nahi hai jab bhi aap available hoiyega tabhi.
Executive: Toh abhi aap
Customer: Main kar lunga main ghante bhar mein.
Executive: Haan haan koi issue nahi hai. Aur second cheez yeh sir ki aap matlab abhi beech mein maine bheja nahi do din toh phir aapne use nahi kiya band kar diya tha use karna.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Abhi do din se jab main bhej hi rahi thi toh aapne use nahi kiya tha ek hi din use ki. Toh main ek bari aapko guide kar doon?
Customer: Haan ghante bhar mein aap mere nayi lead bhej dena aur bhej kar lo.
Executive: Maine toh bhej diya sir WhatsApp pe aapko already bhej diya hai. Baki aap ek ghante baad jab aap available hoiyega toh ek bari mujhe call kar lena thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai. Yeh toh aap sabke hi jaati hogi mere akele ke thodi aati hai.
Executive: Kya cheez?
Customer: Kitne log yeh ek jo hai yeh kitne logon ko bhejte ho aap?
Executive: Lead?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Dekho ek lead jo hoti hai na sir woh chaar logon ke chaar logon ko jaati hai. Taki agar ek supplier usse connect nahi karta toh baki ka other supplier usse connect karke buyer ki requirement fulfill kar de. Toh aapke paas mein chaar log matlab buyer jo hai woh chaar logon ko compete kar raha hota hai. Toh aapko isliye bolte hain ki aap usse connect kar lo jaldi se jaldi taki woh fulfill na ho jaye uski requirement.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Hai na? Toh ek ghante baad abhi aap available hoge na toh main baki ki cheeze aapko ek bari guide kar dungi toh us hisab se phir aap use karne lagoge.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asked about quantity of leads sent.

- Customer stopped using IndiaMART for two days.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed sending Rajasthan leads via WhatsApp.

- Executive explained lead distribution to multiple suppliers.

- Executive offered to guide the customer after one hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will guide customer after one hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, rajasthan, quantity, usage
